meanings.definition: A location for launching and landing spacecraft.
meanings.sent1: The spaceport was bustling with activity as the rocket prepared for liftoff.
meanings.sent2: The government invested in building a new spaceport to support space exploration.
meanings.sent3: The aliens mistakenly landed their spaceship at the wrong spaceport, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a spaceport of ideas, ready to launch into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The spaceport gleamed under the starry sky, a beacon of human achievement.

meanings.definition: The facilities and infrastructure at a location for launching and landing spacecraft.
meanings.sent1: The spaceport's control tower oversaw the busy operations of incoming and outgoing spacecraft.
meanings.sent2: SpaceX has one of the most advanced spaceports in the world, equipped with cutting-edge technology.
meanings.sent3: The spaceport cafeteria served out-of-this-world space-themed dishes to hungry astronauts.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a spaceport of emotions, with ships of joy and sorrow docking and departing.
meanings.sent5: The spaceport hummed with the sounds of engines and chatter, a symphony of space travel.
